summary: 检测MessageSolution企业邮件归档管理系统是否存在CNVD-2021-10543信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞可能导致Windows服务器administrator hash与web账号密码泄露
summary_en: Detect whether the MessageSolution Email Archiving Management System has the CNVD-2021-10543 information leakage vulnerability, which may lead to the leakage of Windows server administrator hash and web account passwords
